data.name: Loki (Teen)
data.description: A teenage version of Loki that applies regeneration to his allied Loki variants and hides a wicked bite up his sleeve.

starItems.name: Loki (Teen)
starItems.description: A teenage version of Loki that applies regeneration to his allied Loki variants and hides a wicked bite up his sleeve.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from the most injured non-summoned ally

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from the most injured non-summoned ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from the most injured non-summoned ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>: 
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
 > When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Drain.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Drain.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Drain.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage on the secondary attack
Flip <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on self and all allies
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Drain.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Flip <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on self and all allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage on the secondary attack
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Drain.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

Flip <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on self and all allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
5.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Drain.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

Flip <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on self and all allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Flip an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
 > Apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Drain on the primary attack
+<color=#86e619>180%</color> damage on the secondary attack
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, +<color=#86e619>320%</color> damage on the primary attack

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>420%</color> damage instead.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>420%</color> damage.

Flip <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on self and all allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> additional negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
 > Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if the primary target is a <color=#fff568>COSMIC HERO</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if the primary target is a <color=#fff568>COSMIC HERO</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary target
Redistribute total health evenly between self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if the primary target is a <color=#fff568>COSMIC HERO</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Redistribute total health evenly between self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if the primary target is a <color=#fff568>COSMIC HERO</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Redistribute total health evenly between self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>75%</color> damage to primary target
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>275%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if the primary target is a <color=#fff568>COSMIC HERO</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Redistribute total health evenly between self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>375%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.

Redistribute total health evenly between self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>: 
 > If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>COSMIC HERO</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>175%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>550%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.

Redistribute total health evenly between self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>: 
 > If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>COSMIC HERO</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.

1.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> ally.

On self or <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally turn, transfer <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> from that character to the enemy with the lowest Resistance that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

2.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> ally.

On self or <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally turn, transfer <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> from that character to the enemy with the lowest Resistance that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

3.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> ally.

On self or <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally turn, transfer <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> from that character to the enemy with the lowest Resistance that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> on Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies
3.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on enemy <color=#fff568>COSMIC HERO</color> Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

4.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> ally.

On self or <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally turn, transfer <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> from that character to the enemy with the lowest Resistance that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
 > On enemy <color=#fff568>COSMIC HERO</color> Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
 > <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.
4.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, while this character or a <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, that character gains +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>100%</color> chance to Counterattack

5.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> ally.

On self or <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally turn, transfer <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> from that character to the enemy with the lowest Resistance that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
 > On enemy <color=#fff568>COSMIC HERO</color> Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
 > If this character or any <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, that character gains  +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>100%</color> chance to Counterattack.
 > <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.
